languages.text: {n}Мгновение звенящей тишины — и голову пронзает тысяча осколков. Знакомый голос по-змеиному оплетает мысли, заглушая их.{/n} "Уходишь, даже не побеседовав со мной, Дитя? Даже не спросив себя, как столь яркая душа сумела сохранить целостность, блуждая в объятьях тьмы, примерив чужой облик? Удивительное везение для смертного".

{n}A moment of ringing silence — and then, a thousand shards pierce your mind. A familiar voice coils around your thoughts, drowning them out:{/n} "Are you leaving without even conversing with me, Child? Without even asking yourself how such a vivid soul managed to remain intact after wandering in the darkness's embrace and donning another's guise? Such rare luck for a mortal."
languages.original_text: {n}Мгновение звенящей тишины — и голову пронзает тысяча осколков. Знакомый голос по-змеиному оплетает мысли, заглушая их.{/n} "Уходишь, даже не побеседовав со мной, Дитя? Даже не спросив себя, как столь яркая душа сумела сохранить целостность, блуждая в объятьях тьмы, примерив чужой облик? Удивительное везение для смертного".

languages.text: {n}Für einen kurzen Moment herrscht Stille ... und dann durchbohren tausend Splitter deinen Verstand. Eine vertraute Stimme windet sich um deine Gedanken und erdrosselt sie:{/n} "Wollt Ihr etwa gehen, ohne mit mir zu sprechen, Kind? Ohne Euch selbst zu fragen, wie eine so lebendige Seele intakt sein kann, nachdem sie durch die Dunkelheit gewandert ist und das Antlitze einer anderen Person trug? Ein seltenes Glück für {mf|einen Sterblichen|eine Sterbliche}."
languages.original_text: {n}A moment of ringing silence — and then, a thousand shards pierce your mind. Without even asking yourself how such a vivid soul managed to remain intact after wandering in the darkness's embrace and donning another's guise? Such rare luck for a mortal."

Ein seltenes Glück für {mf|einen Sterblichen|eine Sterbliche}."

languages.text: {n}Bir anlığına sessizlik oluyor. Sonrasında binlerce parça, zihnini delip geçiyor. Tanıdık bir ses, düşüncelerini sarmalayarak onları boğuyor.{/n} "Benimle konuşmadan mı gideceksin Çocuğum? Böylesine canlı bir ruhun, karanlığın kucağında dolaştıktan ve bir başkasının kılığına girdikten sonra nasıl olup da bozulmadığını sormadan mı gideceksin? Bir fâninin eline epey ender geçen bir fırsat bu."
languages.original_text: {n}A moment of ringing silence — and then, a thousand shards pierce your mind. A familiar voice coils around your thoughts, drowning them out:{/n} "Are you leaving without even conversing with me, Child? Without even asking yourself how such a vivid soul managed to remain intact after wandering in the darkness's embrace and donning another's guise? Such rare luck for a mortal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir anlığına sessizlik oluyor. Sonrasında binlerce parça, zihnini delip geçiyor. Tanıdık bir ses, düşüncelerini sarmalayarak onları boğuyor.{/n} "Benimle konuşmadan mı gideceksin Çocuğum? Böylesine canlı bir ruhun, karanlığın kucağında dolaştıktan ve bir başkasının kılığına girdikten sonra nasıl olup da bozulmadığını sormadan mı gideceksin? Bir fâninin eline epey ender geçen bir fırsat bu."

languages.text: {n}Un silence bourdonnant s'installe, avant que des milliers d'éclats transpercent votre esprit. Une voix familière enveloppe et étouffe vos pensées :{/n} « Vous comptez me quitter sans converser avec moi, mon enfant ? Sans même vous interroger sur comment une âme aussi vive que la vôtre est parvenue à rester intacte après avoir erré dans l'étreinte de l'obscurité et revêtu les atours d'une autre ? Quelle chance, pour un être mortel. »
languages.original_text: {n}A moment of ringing silence — and then, a thousand shards pierce your mind. A familiar voice coils around your thoughts, drowning them out:{/n} "Are you leaving without even conversing with me, Child? Without even asking yourself how such a vivid soul managed to remain intact after wandering in the darkness's embrace and donning another's guise? Such rare luck for a mortal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence bourdonnant s'installe, avant que des milliers d'éclats transpercent votre esprit. Une voix familière enveloppe et étouffe vos pensées :{/n} « Vous comptez me quitter sans converser avec moi, mon enfant ? Sans même vous interroger sur comment une âme aussi vive que la vôtre est parvenue à rester intacte après avoir erré dans l'étreinte de l'obscurité et revêtu les atours d'une autre ? Quelle chance, pour un être mortel. »

languages.text: {n}Se produce un breve y angustioso silencio, y luego un millar de cuchillas asaltan tu mente. Una voz familiar serpentea entre tus pensamientos hasta imponerse a ellos:{/n} «¿Te vas a marchar sin hablar conmigo, criatura? ¿Sin preguntarte siquiera cómo ha logrado un alma tan pujante permanecer incólume tras vagar a tientas por la oscuridad y ataviarse con un cuerpo ajeno? Qué insólita suerte para una criatura mortal».
languages.original_text: {n}A moment of ringing silence — and then, a thousand shards pierce your mind. A familiar voice coils around your thoughts, drowning them out:{/n} "Are you leaving without even conversing with me, Child? Without even asking yourself how such a vivid soul managed to remain intact after wandering in the darkness's embrace and donning another's guise? Such rare luck for a mortal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce un breve y angustioso silencio, y luego un millar de cuchillas asaltan tu mente. Una voz familiar serpentea entre tus pensamientos hasta imponerse a ellos:{/n} «¿Te vas a marchar sin hablar conmigo, criatura? ¿Sin preguntarte siquiera cómo ha logrado un alma tan pujante permanecer incólume tras vagar a tientas por la oscuridad y ataviarse con un cuerpo ajeno? Qué insólita suerte para una criatura mortal».

languages.text: {n}寂静仿佛在你耳边作响，随后，几千个碎片刺穿了你的意识。某个熟悉的声音萦绕在你的脑海中，淹没了你的所有思绪。{/n}“你就打算这么离开吗，孩子？不愿和我说句话吗？如此鲜活的灵魂，在黑暗中徘徊许久，还披上了另一个人的外皮，却依然能保持完整。你真的不愿想想这究竟是怎么回事吗？对凡人而言，这样的好运实属罕见。”
languages.original_text: {n}A moment of ringing silence — and then, a thousand shards pierce your mind. A familiar voice coils around your thoughts, drowning them out:{/n} "Are you leaving without even conversing with me, Child? Without even asking yourself how such a vivid soul managed to remain intact after wandering in the darkness's embrace and donning another's guise? Such rare luck for a mortal."

traits.locale_text: {n}寂静仿佛在你耳边作响，随后，几千个碎片刺穿了你的意识。某个熟悉的声音萦绕在你的脑海中，淹没了你的所有思绪。{/n}“你就打算这么离开吗，孩子？不愿和我说句话吗？如此鲜活的灵魂，在黑暗中徘徊许久，还披上了另一个人的外皮，却依然能保持完整。你真的不愿想想这究竟是怎么回事吗？对凡人而言，这样的好运实属罕见。”

languages.text: {n}一瞬の耳鳴りのような静寂…そして、千の破片があなたの心を突き刺す。馴染みのある声が思考に絡みつき、それをかき消した。{/n}「私と話もせずに去るのか、子よ？闇の抱擁をさまよい、他人の姿を纏いながらも、どうしてこれほど鮮やかな魂が無傷でいられたのか、自分に問いかけもしないのか？凡人にしては稀な幸運だ」
languages.original_text: {n}A moment of ringing silence — and then, a thousand shards pierce your mind. A familiar voice coils around your thoughts, drowning them out:{/n} "Are you leaving without even conversing with me, Child? Without even asking yourself how such a vivid soul managed to remain intact after wandering in the darkness's embrace and donning another's guise? Such rare luck for a mortal."
